text: The 2019 Volta Limburg Classic was the 46th edition of the Volta Limburg Classic cycle race and was held on 6 April 2019 as part of the 2019 UCI Europe Tour. The race started and finished in Eijsden. The race was won by Patrick Müller. ==Teams== Twenty-four teams were invited to take part in the race. These included seven UCI Professional Continental teams and seventeen UCI Continental teams. title: 2019 Volta Limburg Classic
